ygData.subject: Re: Phobia in command? Cyberwolf is flattered.
ygData.msgSnippet: With KitKat in bad shape and now Cave in in even worse shape the answer was clear to him. KitKat and Cave in might not make it to the Alliance base, our first

With KitKat in bad shape and now Cave in in even worse shape the 
answer was clear to him."KitKat and Cave in might not make it to the 
Alliance base, our first priority is to stabilize thier condition so 
we follow Tarantulis's tracks back to the Predacon ship. Dollen, I'm 
going to send you with Reptillica, we need an associate at the 
Alliance base in case the Maximals decide to attack again. I'm 
counting on you to represent our group fail and it could be all our 
tailplates." Phobia placed a hand on Dollens shoulder as a show of 
confidence. The pat on the shoulder also served to place one of his 
babies on him so Phobia could keep updated on what was happening.

He walked over to KitKat and scratched her behind the ears, "Don't 
worry commander, I'll take good care of your troops." He said 
confident in his actions. with a quick slip across the top of the 
wolfs head he removed the baby he'd placed on KitKat seemingly so 
long ago.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Reptilica/Bloodystrike::
> 
> Reptilica frowns. He didn't know the geography of the area too 
well, but he 
> knew enough to get around.
> 
> "Uh, I think the Pred ship might be closer," he replies to Phobia's 
question, 
> "But it was taken over by Rampage, and even it it wasn't, your 
escort left," 
> he says, meaning Tarantulus.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Bloodystrike turns his head to look at Stranato, Inzola, and 
Burning Hammer.
> 
> "Me and Rep are trying to help these Preds out, on Zardus' orders. 
I thought 
> you three returned to base."
